1: וְאַתָּ֡ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> הַקְרֵ֣ב <sup>7126 </sup> <n>And take</n> אֵלֶיךָ֩ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אַהֲרֹ֨ן <sup>175 </sup> <n>thou unto thee Aaron</n> אָחִ֜יךָ <sup>251 </sup> <n>thy brother</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בָּנָ֣יו <sup>1121 </sup> <n>and his sons</n> אִתּ֔וֹ <sup>854 </sup> <n>from</n> מִתּ֛וֹךְ <sup>8432 </sup> <n>with him from among</n> בְּנֵ֥י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> לְכַהֲנוֹ־ <sup>3547 </sup> <n>that he may minister unto me in the priest's office</n> לִ֑י אַהֲרֹ֕ן <sup>175 </sup> <n>[even] Aaron</n> נָדָ֧ב <sup>5070 </sup> <n>Nadab</n> וַאֲבִיה֛וּא <sup>30 </sup> <n>and Abihu</n> אֶלְעָזָ֥ר <sup>499 </sup> <n>Eleazar</n> וְאִיתָמָ֖ר <sup>385 </sup> <n>and Ithamar</n> בְּנֵ֥י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>sons</n> אַהֲרֹֽן׃ <sup>175 </sup> <n>Aaron's</n>

3: וְאַתָּ֗ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>You</n> תְּדַבֵּר֙ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>And thou shalt speak</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> חַכְמֵי־ <sup>2450 </sup> <n>unto all [that are] wise</n> לֵ֔ב <sup>3820 </sup> <n>hearted</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>whom</n> מִלֵּאתִ֖יו <sup>4390 </sup> <n>whom I have filled</n> ר֣וּחַ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>with the spirit</n> חָכְמָ֑ה <sup>2451 </sup> <n>of wisdom</n> וְעָשׂ֞וּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>that they may make</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בִּגְדֵ֧י <sup>899 </sup> <n>garments</n> אַהֲרֹ֛ן <sup>175 </sup> <n>Aaron's</n> לְקַדְּשׁ֖וֹ <sup>6942 </sup> <n>to consecrate</n> לְכַהֲנוֹ־ <sup>3547 </sup> <n>him that he may minister unto me in the priest's office</n> לִֽי׃

38: וְהָיָה֮ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> מֵ֣צַח <sup>4696 </sup> <n>forehead</n> אַהֲרֹן֒ <sup>175 </sup> <n>And it shall be upon Aaron's</n> וְנָשָׂ֨א <sup>5375 </sup> <n>may bear</n> אַהֲרֹ֜ן <sup>175 </sup> <n>that Aaron</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עֲוֹ֣ן <sup>5771 </sup> <n>the iniquity</n> הַקֳּדָשִׁ֗ים <sup>6944 </sup> <n>of the holy things</n> אֲשֶׁ֤ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> יַקְדִּ֙ישׁוּ֙ <sup>6942 </sup> <n>shall hallow</n> בְּנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>which the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> לְכָֽל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>to all</n> מַתְּנֹ֖ת <sup>4979 </sup> <n>gifts</n> קָדְשֵׁיהֶ֑ם <sup>6944 </sup> <n>in all their holy</n> וְהָיָ֤ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>be on</n> מִצְחוֹ֙ <sup>4696 </sup> <n>upon his forehead</n> תָּמִ֔יד <sup>8548 </sup> <n>and it shall be always</n> לְרָצ֥וֹן <sup>7522 </sup> <n>that they may be accepted</n> לָהֶ֖ם לִפְנֵ֥י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n>
39: וְשִׁבַּצְתָּ֙ <sup>7660 </sup> <n>And thou shalt embroider</n> הַכְּתֹ֣נֶת <sup>3801 </sup> <n>the coat</n> שֵׁ֔שׁ <sup>8336 </sup> <n>of fine linen</n> וְעָשִׂ֖יתָ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and thou shalt make</n> מִצְנֶ֣פֶת <sup>4701 </sup> <n>the mitre</n> שֵׁ֑שׁ <sup>8336 </sup> <n>[of] fine linen</n> וְאַבְנֵ֥ט <sup>73 </sup> <n>the girdle</n> תַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and thou shalt make</n> מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <sup>4639 </sup> <n>the work</n> רֹקֵֽם׃ <sup>7551 </sup> <n>of a weaver</n>
40: וְלִבְנֵ֤י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>sons</n> אַהֲרֹן֙ <sup>175 </sup> <n>And for Aaron's</n> תַּעֲשֶׂ֣ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>thou shalt make</n> כֻתֳּנֹ֔ת <sup>3801 </sup> <n>coats</n> וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and thou shalt make</n> לָהֶ֖ם אַבְנֵטִ֑ים <sup>73 </sup> <n>for them girdles</n> וּמִגְבָּעוֹת֙ <sup>4021 </sup> <n>and bonnets</n> תַּעֲשֶׂ֣ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>shalt thou make</n> לָהֶ֔ם לְכָב֖וֹד <sup>3519 </sup> <n>for them for glory</n> וּלְתִפְאָֽרֶת׃ <sup>8597 </sup> <n>and for beauty</n>
41: וְהִלְבַּשְׁתָּ֤ <sup>3847 </sup> <n>And thou shalt put</n> אֹתָם֙ <sup>853 </sup> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אַהֲרֹ֣ן <sup>175 </sup> <n>them upon Aaron</n> אָחִ֔יךָ <sup>251 </sup> <n>thy brother</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בָּנָ֖יו <sup>1121 </sup> <n>and his sons</n> אִתּ֑וֹ <sup>853 </sup> וּמָשַׁחְתָּ֨ <sup>4886 </sup> <n>with him and shalt anoint</n> אֹתָ֜ם <sup>853 </sup> וּמִלֵּאתָ֧ <sup>4390 </sup> <n>accomplish</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יָדָ֛ם <sup>3027 </sup> <n>them</n> וְקִדַּשְׁתָּ֥ <sup>6942 </sup> <n>them and sanctify</n> אֹתָ֖ם <sup>853 </sup> וְכִהֲנ֥וּ <sup>3547 </sup> <n>them that they may minister unto me in the priest's office</n> לִֽי׃
42: וַעֲשֵׂ֤ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>And thou shalt make</n> לָהֶם֙ מִכְנְסֵי־ <sup>4370 </sup> <n>breeches</n> בָ֔ד <sup>906 </sup> <n>them linen</n> לְכַסּ֖וֹת <sup>3680 </sup> <n>to cover</n> בְּשַׂ֣ר <sup>1320 </sup> <n>flesh</n> עֶרְוָ֑ה <sup>6172 </sup> <n>bare</n> מִמָּתְנַ֥יִם <sup>4975 </sup> <n>from the loins</n> וְעַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>even</n> יְרֵכַ֖יִם <sup>3409 </sup> <n>even unto the thighs</n> יִהְיֽוּ׃ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>shall reach</n>
43: וְהָיוּ֩ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>shall be on</n> אַהֲרֹ֨ן <sup>175 </sup> <n>And they shall be upon Aaron</n> וְעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and on</n> בָּנָ֜יו <sup>1121 </sup> <n>and upon his sons</n> בְּבֹאָ֣ם ׀ <sup>935 </sup> <n>when they come</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> אֹ֣הֶל <sup>168 </sup> <n>in unto the tabernacle</n> מוֹעֵ֗ד <sup>4150 </sup> <n>of the congregation</n> א֣וֹ <sup>176 </sup> <n>or</n> בְגִשְׁתָּ֤ם <sup>5066 </sup> <n>or when they come near</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> הַמִּזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <sup>4196 </sup> <n>unto the altar</n> לְשָׁרֵ֣ת <sup>8334 </sup> <n>to minister</n> בַּקֹּ֔דֶשׁ <sup>6944 </sup> <n>in the holy</n> וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יִשְׂא֥וּ <sup>5375 </sup> <n>[place] that they bear</n> עָוֹ֖ן <sup>5771 </sup> <n>not iniquity</n> וָמֵ֑תוּ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>and die</n> חֻקַּ֥ת <sup>2708 </sup> <n>[it shall be] a statute</n> עוֹלָ֛ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>for ever</n> ל֖וֹ וּלְזַרְע֥וֹ <sup>2233 </sup> <n>unto him and his seed</n> אַחֲרָֽיו׃ <sup>310 </sup> <n>after</n> ס
